pr_title: Map methods in AbstractBlock and subclasses

timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Actually, what parameters do you want me to restore?
replies.author: LemmaEOF

replies.bodyText: Hmm, somehow all the parameter names are lost... Like world, pos, etc
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Ah yeah, I can fix that real quick.
replies.author: LemmaEOF

timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Absolutely nothing! It’s called in world#setBlockState and PistonBlock#move, has no default impl, and no overrides.
replies.author: LemmaEOF

timeline.message: rename slowDownMultiplier to unify with settings name

timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: That's a good point. I think we should name the field/arg materialColorFactory or colorFactory and have the method still be named materialColor
replies.author: LemmaEOF

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		ARG 5 posFrom
          
          
            
            		ARG 5 fromPos
